title: Public opinion on U.S. use of drone strikes , by country 2014
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 44 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Disapprove, and Approve. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Disapprove had the highest Share of respondents for Country Venezuela and Approve had the lowest Share of respondents for Country Pakistan.
There is a gap of 65.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Disapprove in Country Venezuela and Israel.
Averaging all 2 groups Disapprove, and Approve, the Country France is the maximum Share of respondents and India is the minimum Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 44 different Countrys for 2 groups Disapprove, and Approve that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Venezuela had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Disapprove. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Country Pakistan for Approve.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 44 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Disapprove, and Approve. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Disapprove had the highest Share of respondents for Country Venezuela and Approve had the lowest Share of respondents for Country Pakistan.
There is a gap of 65.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Disapprove in Country Venezuela and Israel.
Averaging all 2 groups Disapprove, and Approve, the Country France is the maximum Share of respondents and India is the minimum Share of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 44 different Countrys for 2 groups Disapprove, and Approve that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Venezuela had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Disapprove. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Country Pakistan for Approve.
Among all the Countrys, Disapprove had the highest Share of respondents in Country Venezuela and lowest Share of respondents in Country Israel.
The maximum Share of respondents for Disapprove that was found in Country Venezuela was 3.41 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Country Israel.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents was found in case of Disapprove.
On average, the Country France had the highest Share of respondents for all 2 groups Disapprove, and Approve. Whereas India had the lowest average Share of respondents.
